content.rendered:
Contents

  • How can I get 2023 Super Bowl Tickets?
  • What is included in Super Bowl Travel Packages?
  • When do 2023 Super Bowl packages go on sale?
  • What items are prohibited at the Super Bowl?
  • What are the best seats at the Super Bowl?
  • How do I get to State Farm Stadium for the Super Bowl?
  • What other events are going on during Super Bowl weekend?
  • Where should I stay in Phoenix for the Super Bowl?
  • What day should I arrive in Phoenix?

How can I get 2023 Super Bowl Tickets?

Roadtrips’ 2023 Super Bowl packages include tickets to the big game. All of our packages are fully customizable to allow you to choose your seats anywhere in State Farm Stadium.

What is included in Super Bowl Travel Packages?

Roadtrips’ 2023 Super Bowl Travel Packages include first class accommodations in your preferred hotel, tickets in your choice of seating category, Roadtrips in-city hosts, admission to the NFL Fan Experience, a personalized itinerary, a commemorative gift package and official program, pre-trip travel planning and concierge services, plus a number of other extras that can be added to further customize your experience.

When do 2023 Super Bowl packages go on sale?

Packages are available now. Contact one of our Sports Travel Specialists to get started planning your experience.

What items are prohibited at the Super Bowl?

A list of prohibited items at State Farm Stadium can be found below. All of our Super Bowl guests will receive a list of prohibited items along with their travel documents.

  • Alcoholic beverages and illegal drugs or substances
  • Animals or pets (not including service animals)
  • Any item that could obstruct a guest’s view of the field
  • Any item that is deemed dangerous or perceived to be dangerous, unsafe, or offensive
  • Any Bags which do not meet Bag Policy guidelines
  • Balls, Frisbees and inflatables
  • Banners or signs larger than 3’ x 2’ or any with a non-sport message
  • Bottles, cans, containers, thermoses and flasks
  • Chairs (including folding chairs) and non-approved seat cushions
  • Chewing tobacco and E-cigarettes
  • Fireworks, candles, flares or balloons
  • Glitter/confetti
  • Hard or Soft Coolers, Baskets, or Containers
  • Lighters
  • Laptop computers
  • Laser pointers
  • Mace and pepper gas
  • Noisemakers
  • Outside food
  • Peanuts
  • Professional Cameras and Camera Equipment, Selfie sticks, Tripods, and Video or Audio Recording Equipment, Drones
  • Projectiles
  • Skateboards, golf carts, rollerbladers or hoverboards
  • Toy/replica weapons
  • Umbrellas larger than 12 inches
  • Weapons

What are the best seats at the Super Bowl?

The best seats are largely a matter of personal preference. Roadtrips guests have access to seating anywhere in State Farm Stadium including luxury suites and club seating.

How do I get to State Farm Stadium for the Super Bowl?

Our Super Bowl packages include round-trip stadium transfers on game day for convenient access to State Farm Stadium.

What other events are going on during Super Bowl weekend?

There are always plenty of fun events to attend during Super Bowl weekend. Some of our favorites are detailed below.

Saturday’s NFL Fan Experience is an interactive event, set up specifically for Super Bowl week. It celebrates the sport’s history and the incredible atmosphere of the Super Bowl. Highlights include: interactive games, the NFL Play 60 Zone, past and present NFL player autograph sessions, historical Super Bowl displays including the Vince Lombardi trophy, and the NFL Shop.

On Sunday, the Players Tailgate at the Super Bowl has earned the reputation as the best Super Bowl pre-game experience, where over 25 active NFL players, celebrities and guests eat, drink and get entertained before the big game. Described as a culinary experience in itself, The Players Tailgate features open premium bars and all-you-can-eat dining with gourmet dishes prepared by celebrity chefs.

Where should I stay in Phoenix for the Super Bowl?

Roadtrips’ Super Bowl hotels are carefully chosen for their location, service, and amenities. More detailed information on our 2023 Super Bowl hotels can be found here.

What day should I arrive in Phoenix?

This is largely personal preference, though most of our guests will arrive on the Thursday prior to the game. This allows for a couple of days to settle in and enjoy the pre-game festivities before the main event on Sunday.
